name: I used my blogging to say that I loved (boy)girlz
name_original: I used my blogging to say that I loved (boy)girlz
description:
Play with -> arrow keys <- to navigate the glitched memory lane of 2010's blogging era where you could tell people you love them on the internet (and they said it back).

Only the left rectangle is scrollable.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for the 2010's gamejam organized by Velvet and Rune at the Pang Pang Club using the Axoona's amazing tool Paddler along with Audacity, Ezgif and Illustrator.

Ressemblances with an actual blog post and its comments aren't fortuitous. Years later I can tell that along those love declarations  some were friends but ((**~~some were definitely crushez~~**)).
